title: Currying in Python Using functools.partial
description: In functional programming, currying is a technique of transforming a function that takes multiple arguments into a sequence of functions that each take a single argument. In Python, we can use the functools.partial() function to implement currying.

meta.title: Mastering Currying in Python with functools.partial
meta.description: Discover the power of currying in Python and learn how to implement it using the functools.partial function.
meta.keywords: Python, currying, functools.partial, functional programming, coding tutorial
